name: frankgpt
description: An (unsupported, unfunded and unrequested) VSCode Extension for safe(r) ChatGPT integration by a nervous DoD person.

commands.title: FrankGPT: Hello World
commands.description: Displays a 'Hello World' message as a simple demonstration of the extension's functionality.

commands.title: FrankGPT: Ask a Question
commands.description: Allows you to ask any question and get a response generated by ChatGPT.

commands.title: FrankGPT: Set API Key
commands.description: Set your OpenAI API key for ChatGPT queries. This key is stored securely and used for all API calls.

commands.title: FrankGPT: Clear API Key
commands.description: Clear the stored OpenAI API key from your VSCode settings. Use this when you need to change the key or remove it for security purposes.

commands.title: FrankGPT: Select Model
commands.description: Select an OpenAI GPT model to use for generating responses.

commands.title: FrankGPT: Analyze Code
commands.description: Analyze the selected code block using FrankGPT.

commands.title: FrankGPT: Open Webview
commands.description: Open the ChatGPT response in a webview panel.
